title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type has no effect.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a database field with the three types of content mentioned above.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text content type has no effect on how the content is displayed.
